mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "officeId", a.class_id AS "classId", a.user_id AS "userId", a.type AS "type", a.days AS "days", a.dates AS "dates", a.reason AS "reason", a.read_user AS "readUser", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.account AS "account", a.status AS "status", su.name AS "userName", cc.name AS "className", su.user_type AS "userType"
LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON a.user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN c_class cc ON a.class_id = cc.id
mapper.select: SELECT l.date AS "date", l.status AS "status" FROM( SELECT h.date, CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(h.date, h.workStr) IS NOT NULL AND FIND_IN_SET(h.date, h.workStr) <> 0 THEN 2 ELSE ( CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(h.date, h.leaveStr) IS NOT NULL AND FIND_IN_SET(h.date, h.leaveStr) <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) END AS "status" FROM( SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-', aa.value) AS "date", ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(n.leaveDate) AS "leaveStr" FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(m.leaveDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS "leaveDate" FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.dates,',',b.help_topic_id + 1),',' ,- 1) AS "leaveDate" FROM c_leave a JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < (length(a.dates) - length(REPLACE(a.dates, ',', '')) + 1) WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.status = 1 ) m WHERE DATE_FORMAT(m.leaveDate, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-01'),'%Y%m') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(m.leaveDate, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY m.leaveDate ) n ) AS "leaveStr", ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(b.workDate) AS "workStr" FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.sign_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS "workDate" FROM c_work a WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.sign_time, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-01'),'%Y%m') AND a.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.sign_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY a.sign_time ) b ) AS "workStr" FROM user_help aa WHERE aa.type = 'day_of_month' AND CAST(aa.value AS SIGNED) <= DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(CONCAT(#{year}, '-', #{month}, '-01'))) ) h ) l WHERE l.status <> 0

SELECT y.id AS "id", y.name AS "name", y.image_id AS "photo", y.status AS "status" FROM ( SELECT h.id, h.name, h.image_id, CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(h.id, h.workUserStr) IS NOT NULL AND FIND_IN_SET(h.id, h.workUserStr) <> 0 THEN 2 ELSE ( CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(h.id, h.leaveUserStr) IS NOT NULL AND FIND_IN_SET(h.id, h.leaveUserStr) <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) END AS "status" FROM( SELECT su.id, su.name, su.image_id, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(n.user_id) FROM ( SELECT cw.user_id FROM c_work cw WHERE DATE_FORMAT(cw.sign_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{selDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND cw.office_id = #{officeId} AND cw.class_id = #{classId} GROUP BY cw.user_id ) n ) AS "workUserStr", ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(m.user_id) FROM ( SELECT cl.user_id FROM c_leave cl WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{selDate}, cl.dates) AND cl.office_id = #{officeId} AND cl.class_id = #{classId} AND cl.status = 1 GROUP BY cl.user_id ) m ) AS "leaveUserStr" FROM sys_user su WHERE su.office_id = #{officeId} AND su.class_id = #{classId} AND su.user_type = 5 ) h ) y ORDER BY y.status DESC

select group_concat(z.num) AS "str" from ( SELECT mh.`value` AS "status", IFNULL(ud.num,0) AS "num" from user_help mh LEFT JOIN( SELECT y.status, count(y.id) AS "num" FROM ( SELECT h.id, h.name, h.image_id, CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(h.id, h.workUserStr) IS NOT NULL AND FIND_IN_SET(h.id, h.workUserStr) <> 0 THEN 2 ELSE ( CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(h.id, h.leaveUserStr) IS NOT NULL AND FIND_IN_SET(h.id, h.leaveUserStr) <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) END AS "status" FROM ( SELECT su.id, su.name, su.image_id, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(n.user_id) FROM ( SELECT cw.user_id FROM c_work cw WHERE DATE_FORMAT(cw.sign_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{selDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND cw.office_id = #{officeId} AND cw.class_id = #{classId} GROUP BY cw.user_id ) n ) AS "workUserStr", ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(m.user_id) FROM ( SELECT cl.user_id FROM c_leave cl WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{selDate}, cl.dates) AND cl.office_id = #{officeId} AND cl.class_id = #{classId} AND cl.status = 1 GROUP BY cl.user_id ) m ) AS "leaveUserStr" FROM sys_user su WHERE su.office_id = #{officeId} AND su.class_id = #{classId} AND su.user_type = 5 ) h )y GROUP BY y.status ) ud ON ud.status = mh.`value` WHERE mh.type = 'attendance_status' ) z
